entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as a person who will be gone by the end of the year. He is described as someone whose job is jinxed and has caused the death of Quirrell.

entities.name: quirrell
entities.description: Quirrell is mentioned as someone who died while doing Snape's job.

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Slughorn is mentioned as a person who might not want to stay long-term in his position.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is mentioned as someone who did not stay long-term in his position.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as a person who has imparted the news about Snape's job and seems oblivious to its sensational nature.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who is talking with Harry and Hermione about Snape's job.

entities.name: hermione

relationships.description: Snape's job caused the death of Quirrell.
Slughorn and Moody both had similar experiences in their positions, where they did not stay long-term.
